text: Luís Mesquita de Oliveira, best known as Luisinho, (29 March 1911, in Rio de Janeiro - 27 December 1983, in São Paulo)CBF profile is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team.He was son of Ernesto Luiz de Oliveira and Cecilia Mesquita de Oliveira, and was the fifth of seven brothers and one sister. One brother, Carlos, was football player, but for short time, because become a doctor. Luiz Mesquita de Oliveira was a lawyer for many years for the São Paulo government ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro
title: Luisinho (footballer, born 1911)
